name: Project Smash
description:
The game is oriented to be a fast paced combat game withing a 2D platformer environment. 

It is pretended to have an easy to medium difficulty with high accessibility. It will tell the journey of our main character who must discover the truth about the sinister world she inhabits. 

This game will feature a combat system using 4 buttons ( Attack, Tool, Guard and Evasion) combined with a leveling up system that will enhance the values of our character and unlock some passive / active skills. To keep the diversity of actions and events, the game will  also feature a tool system (Like legend of Zelda) that the player will have to find and use in order to to reach areas that without those she wouldn’t be able to continue her journey.

The game is focused to be a combination of these games (Celeste, Sekiro, Dead Cells, Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Vigil)

After playing our game, please answer this Google Form to let us know what you think about the game (15 mins top). 

We hope you enjoy are  In Development Game!!

Thanks!!
